subject: feat(hooks): add SessionStart hook to fetch global rules on web
body:
Adds a SessionStart hook that runs in Claude Code web sessions,
fetching CLAUDE.md from GitHub Pages and writing it to
~/.claude/CLAUDE.md. This lets any project that includes the
.claude/ directory automatically pull shared rules at session start.
